thread.title: Men's soccer | Perrault's hat trick lifts Marlins
thread.title_full: Men's soccer | Perrault's hat trick lifts Marlins | HamptonRoads.com | PilotOnline.com

author: The Virginian-Pilot
title: Men's soccer | Perrault's hat trick lifts Marlins
text:
VIRGINIA BEACH Ricky Perrault's hat trick Monday powered Virginia Wesleyan to a 4-1 ODAC men's soccer victory over Shenandoah.
The Portsmouth Christian graduate scored his fourth, fifth and sixth goals of the season for the Marlins (5-3-2, 2-1-2), who play at Randolph-Macon at 4:30 p.m. Wednesday.
Ryan Kraus also scored for Virginia Wesleyan.
